articles.title: UK grants early access to Gilead's remdesivir for Covid-19 - Pharmaceutical Technology
articles.description: The UK Government has announced that some adults and adolescents hospitalised with Covid-19 on the NHS will have access to Gilead Sciences' remdesivir.
articles.content:
The UK government will work with Gilead to supply remdesivir to NHS. Credit: Gerd Altmann from Pixabay.
